sqlMap.select: select count(*) as countValue from CheckStockListList as csl,materiel as m,CargoSpace as c where csl.materielCode=m.materielCode and csl.cargoSpaceCode=c.cargoSpaceCode and and csCode=#csCode#

select csl.csCode, csl.materielCode, m.materielName, csl.cargoSpaceCode, c.cargoSpaceName, csl.csStartPrice, csl.csStartNumber, csl.csCheckPrice, csl.csCheckNumber, csl.csDiffMessage, csl.csRemark, csl.csGM from CheckStockListList as csl,materiel as m,CargoSpace as c where csl.materielCode=m.materielCode and csl.cargoSpaceCode=c.cargoSpaceCode and and csCode=#csCode# limit #startValue#,#endValue#
sqlMap.update: update CheckStockList set cargoSpaceCode=#cargoSpaceCode#, csStartPrice=#csStartPrice#, csStartNumber=#csStartNumber#, csCheckPrice=#csCheckPrice#, csCheckNumber=#csCheckNumber#, csDiffMessage=#csDiffMessage#, csRemark=#csRemark#, csGM=#csGM# where materielCode=#materielCode# and csCode=#csCode#
